ComicInfo.Title: The Darkness 1/2
ComicInfo.Summary: A summary of the Darkness and events in The Darkness series.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:36:27. [CVDB118694]
